intro: Torenia flava, commonly known as the yellow torenia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It is characterized by its vibrant yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, often resembling small bells. The plant has heart-shaped, velvety leaves that are typically a deep green color. Torenia flava thrives in moist, well-drained soil and prefers partial to full sunlight. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking appearance and ease of care.
